lyrics: Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?
description: A shot of a person looking into a mirror, unsure of what is real and what is not.

lyrics: Caught in a landslide, no escape from reality
description: A person standing at the base of a mountain, looking up at a rock slide coming towards them.

lyrics: Open your eyes, look up to the skies and see
description: A shot of a person lying on the grass, staring up at the clouds in the sky.

lyrics: I'm just a poor boy, I need no sympathy
description: A close-up of a person's face, looking sad and alone.

lyrics: Because I'm easy come, easy go, little high, little low
description: A shot of a person on a roller coaster, experiencing highs and lows.

lyrics: Any way the wind blows doesn't really matter to me, to me
description: A shot of a person standing on a beach, looking out at the waves crashing on the shore as the wind blows.

lyrics: [Piano]
description: A close shot of a piano

lyrics: Mama, just killed a man
description: A person holding a gun, standing over a lifeless body.

lyrics: Put a gun against his head, pulled my trigger, now he's dead
description: A close-up of a person's hand holding a gun.

lyrics: Mama, life had just begun
description: A shot of a newborn baby in a hospital room, with a happy mother holding it.

lyrics: But now I've gone and thrown it all away
description: A shot of a person throwing a bunch of papers into a trash can.

lyrics: Mama, ooh, didn't mean to make you cry
description: A close-up of a mother's face, crying over something her child did.

lyrics: If I'm not back again this time tomorrow, carry on, carry on as if nothing really matters
description: A shot of a person getting into a car and driving away, leaving everything behind.

lyrics: [Piano]
description: A group of musicians performing on stage

lyrics: Too late, my time has come
description: A shot of a person lying in a hospital bed, with doctors and family members surrounding them.

lyrics: Sends shivers down my spine, body's aching all the time
description: A close-up of a person's face, showing pain and discomfort.

lyrics: Goodbye, everybody, I've got to go, gotta leave you all behind and face the truth
description: A shot of a person getting on a plane and flying away.

lyrics: Mama, ooh (Any way the wind blows), I don't wanna die
description: A shot of a person looking out the window of an airplane, scared of what's to come.

lyrics: I sometimes wish I'd never been born at all
description: A shot of a person standing on the edge of a tall building, contemplating suicide.

lyrics: [Guitar]
description: A person playing the guitar

lyrics: I see a little silhouetto of a man, Scaramouche, Scaramouche, will you do the Fandango?
description: A shot of a person at a party, dancing with someone dressed up as Scaramouche.

lyrics: Thunderbolt and lightning, very, very frightening me
description: A shot of a person outside during a thunderstorm, lightning striking all around them.

lyrics: (Galileo) Galileo, (Galileo) Galileo, Galileo Figaro magnifico
description: A shot of a person playing a guitar, singing these lyrics.

lyrics: But I'm just a poor boy, nobody loves me
description: A young man sits alone in a dark room, hunched over, looking sad and dejected.

lyrics: He's just a poor boy from a poor family
description: A shot of a poor family sitting around a table, looking sad and defeated.

lyrics: Spare him his life from this monstrosity
description: A shot of a person pleading for someone else's life.

lyrics: Easy come, easy go, will you let me go?
description: A man sitting at a desk surrounded by papers and books, with a look of exhaustion and defeat.

lyrics: Bismillah! No, we will not let you go
description: A group of people wearing black and white, standing in a circle around a person in the center, who's begging to be let go.

lyrics: (Let him go) Bismillah! We will not let you go
description: A close-up shot of a man's face, looking straight ahead with determination.

lyrics: (Let him go) Bismillah! We will not let you go
description: A group of people standing on a rooftop, holding up banners and signs that read "We will not let you go."

lyrics: (Let me go) Will not let you go
description: A man in a straitjacket, struggling to free himself while being held down by two others.

lyrics: (Let me go) Will not let you go
description: A woman standing in front of a door, pushing against it with all her strength, while someone tries to push it open from the other side.

lyrics: (Never, never, never, never let me go) Ah
description: A couple holding hands while standing on a beach, looking out at the sunset.

lyrics: No, no, no, no, no, no, no
description: A woman shaking her head in disbelief, with tears streaming down her face.

lyrics: (Oh, mamma mia, mamma mia) Mamma mia, let me go
description: A man on his knees, begging for mercy, while a group of people stand around him with arms crossed.

lyrics: Beelzebub has a devil put aside for me, for me, for me!

lyrics: [Guitar]
description: A band performing rock on stage

lyrics: So you think you can stone me and spit in my eye?

lyrics: Oh, baby, can't do this to me, baby!

lyrics: Just gotta get out, just gotta get right outta here

lyrics: [Guitar]

lyrics: (Ooh, yeah, ooh, yeah)

lyrics: Nothing really matters

description: A person playing the piano on stage
